Uses of Class
uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.objects.Table

  • Packages that use Table 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app
    Provides the classes necessary to create an applet and the classes an applet uses to navigate the GUI.
    uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management
    Provides the classes necessary to query the database in order to manipulate elements in the database.

      Methods in uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app with parameters of type Table 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TablesController.changeToBusy(Table table)
      Changes the color of the table shape (rectangle or circle) based on the status of the Table object passed to the method.
      void TablesController.updateNumberOfPeople(Table table, int numberOfPeople)
      Updates the number of people in the capacity labels based on the current status of the table as well as the number of people.

    • Uses of Table in uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management

      Methods in uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management with parameters of type Table 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int TableManager.getCurrentOrderId(Table table)
      Queries the Table_master table in the database for the current orderId at a given table number, as specified by the Table object passed to the method.
      int TableManager.getTableCapacity(Table table)
      Queries the Table_master table in the database for the table capacity of a given table number, as specified by the Table object The capacity is extracted from the data and stored as an int which the method then returns.
      void TableManager.updateCurrentOrderId(Table table)
      Updates the Table_master table in the database.
      void TableManager.updateNumberOfPeople(Table table)
      Updates the Table_master table in the database by updating the the current number of people at a table as specified by table number in the object passed as an argument.
      void TableManager.updateTableRecord(Table table)
      Updates the Table_master table in the database by updating the information relative to the specified table number in the Table object passed as an argument.
